name: DONCON'S WRATH
description:
After a failed experiment Duncan accidentally summons the almighty DONCON. Now, Duncan must do everything in his power to appease this evil specter, or face its wrath.

DONCON is impatient and if he doesn't recieve a gift of some kind for long enough it's game over for you, so keep an eye on DONCON's mood bar on the bottom of the screen. Bullets can't kill you but they can and will stun you and destroy the latest gift you picked up.

CONTROLS:
W, A, S, D - move
LMB - throw gift
F - toggle fullscreen

CREDITS:
Music: Eric Matyas
Other stuff: Me

Feedback is always appreciated so don't forget to tell me what you thought in the comments.
